description.raw:
The log playback system fails to parse the state log file if I try to play it back from a different location than the one it’s created in. The problem is that the log filepath is [embedded](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/0c60411df5f6b4a0c9b6f7fb9ea3b91e7f068f5b/src/systems/log/LogRecord.cc#lines-205) in the sdf topic in the recorded log file, and the playback system relies on the assumption that the log location is in the same path in order to read the sdf string back.

This PR updates the log playback system to do an additional path-independent check to find the sdf topic when playing back the state log. Also updated the log system integration test to demonstrate playing back a state log file from a different location.
description.html:
The log playback system fails to parse the state log file if I try to play it back from a different location than the one it’s created in. The problem is that the log filepath is embedded in the sdf topic in the recorded log file, and the playback system relies on the assumption that the log location is in the same path in order to read the sdf string back.

This PR updates the log playback system to do an additional path-independent check to find the sdf topic when playing back the state log. Also updated the log system integration test to demonstrate playing back a state log file from a different location.

title.raw: Support log playback from a different path
title.html: Support log playback from a different path
